title: Yellowstone National Park: Canyon Area Construction
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions     Canyon Area Construction                Canyon Area Construction Projects         Visitors can still access the Brink of Lower Falls. NPS/Neal Herbert  This summer there will be construction projects occurring at several places in the Canyon Area. Inspiration Point Inspiration Point will be closed for reconstruction this summer/fall beginning June 20. North Rim Trail Through the summer, a section of the North Rim Trail between the Brink of Upper Falls and the Brink of Lower Falls will be closed for reconstruction (see map below). During this closure, visitors will not be able to walk the full length of the North Rim Trail. The Brink of Upper Falls and Brink of Lower Falls will be accessible from their respective trailheads. A crew of students from Montana Conservation Corps will be assisting the National Park Service trail crew with the work.      Â     A section of the North Rim Trail is closed for reconstruction.
